lead_paragraph: CHUNGKING, China, March 1 (AP) -- Chinese shock troops have recaptured the Kiangsi Province city of Fengsin and a half dozen towns in Kiangsu, while the Japanese maintained offensives in two other provinces, a communique announced today.
abstract: Chinese retake Fenghsin, Chansyuokwang and other Kiangsu towns; Jap troops maintain attacks on Chinese positions, Shantung; Jap capture of Mengting reptd
snippet: CHUNGKING, China, March 1 (AP) -- Chinese shock troops have recaptured the Kiangsi Province city of Fengsin and a half dozen towns in Kiangsu, while the Japanese maintained offensives in two other provinces, a communique announced today....
